Package skywaysolutions.app.staff

Interface IStaffAccessor

All Superinterfaces:
IRepairable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AccountController
public interface IStaffAccessor extends IRepairable
Provides a staff accessor interface to manage and authenticate staff accounts.
Author:
Alfred Manville

  • Method Details

    • refreshAccount

      void refreshAccount(long id) throws CheckedException
      Refreshes the cache of the specified account.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the account.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - An error occurred during refresh.

    • assureDefaultAdministratorAccount

      void assureDefaultAdministratorAccount() throws CheckedException
      Assures the default administrator account of ID 1 exists.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - An assurance error has occurred.

    • getLoggedInAccountID

      Long getLoggedInAccountID()
      Gets the logged in account ID, null if no account logged in.
      Returns:
      The logged in account ID or null.

    • getLoggedInAccountEmail

      String getLoggedInAccountEmail()
      Gets the logged in account email, null if no account is logged in.
      Returns:
      The logged in account email or null.

    • createAccount

      long createAccount(PersonalInformation info, StaffRole role, Decimal commission, String currency, String password, Long id) throws CheckedException
      Creates an account with the specified personal information, role, commission rate, local currency and password. An ID can also be specified for creation.
      Parameters:
      info - The personal information of the user.
      role - The role of the user.
      commission - The commission rate percentage of the user.
      currency - The local currency of the user.
      password - The user's password.
      id - The user's ID, null to generate a new one.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - Account creation fails.

    • authenticateAccount

      boolean authenticateAccount(String emailAddress, String password) throws CheckedException
      Authenticates an account with the specified emailAddress and password.
      Parameters:
      emailAddress - The email address to authenticate as.
      password - The password to authenticate with.
      Returns:
      If the authentication was successful.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - Accessing account information failed.

    • logoutAccount

      boolean logoutAccount()
      Logs out the current logged in account.
      Returns:
      Whether the current account was logged out.

    • changePassword

      void changePassword(String emailAddress, String password) throws CheckedException
      Changes the password of an account.
      Parameters:
      emailAddress - The email address of the account (Null for the current logged-in account).
      password - The new password for the account.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - Changing the account password has failed.

    • clearPassword

      void clearPassword(String emailAddress) throws CheckedException
      Clears the password of an account.
      Parameters:
      emailAddress - The email address of the account.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - Changing the account password has failed.

    • getPersonalInformation

      PersonalInformation getPersonalInformation(String emailAddress) throws CheckedException
      Gets the personal information of an account.
      Parameters:
      emailAddress - The email address of the account (Null for the current logged-in account).
      Returns:
      The PersonalInformation of the account.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - Retrieving the personal information has failed.

    • setPersonalInformation

      void setPersonalInformation(String emailAddress, PersonalInformation info) throws CheckedException
      Sets the personal information of an account, the email address within the PersonalInformation class is ignored.
      Parameters:
      emailAddress - The email address of the account (Null for the current logged-in account).
      info - The new set of PersonalInformation.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - Storing the personal information has failed.

    • getAccountID

      long getAccountID(String emailAddress) throws CheckedException
      Gets the account ID.
      Parameters:
      emailAddress - The email address of the account (Null for the current logged-in account).
      Returns:
      The account ID.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - The account could not be retrieved.

    • getAccountEmail

      Gets the account email.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the account.
      Returns:
      The email.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - The account could not be retrieved.

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      The staff role.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - The account could not be retrieved.

      Parameters:

      role - The staff role.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - The account could not be stored.

      Parameters:
      role - The role to filter by.
      Returns:
      An array of account email addresses.
      Throws:
      CheckedException

    • deleteAccount

      void deleteAccount(String emailAddress) throws CheckedException
      Deletes an account given the email address.
      Parameters:
      emailAddress - The email address of the account to delete.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - The account deletion operation failed.

    • getCommission

      Gets the commission rate of an account.
      Parameters:
      emailAddress - The email address of the account.
      Returns:
      The commission rate percentage.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - The commission rate could not be retrieved.

    • setCommission

      void setCommission(String emailAddress, Decimal commission) throws CheckedException
      Sets the commission rate of an account.
      Parameters:
      emailAddress - The email address of the account.
      commission - The new commission rate percentage of the account.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - The commission rate storage operation failed.

    • getCurrency

      String getCurrency(String emailAddress) throws CheckedException
      Gets the local currency of an account.
      Parameters:
      emailAddress - The email address of the account (Null for the current logged-in account).
      Returns:
      The local currency name.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - The account currency could not be retrieved.

    • setCurrency

      void setCurrency(String emailAddress, String currency) throws CheckedException
      Sets the local currency of an account.
      Parameters:
      emailAddress - The email address of the account (Null for the current logged-in account).
      currency - The new local currency of the account.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - The local currency update operation failed.
